{"step_by_step_thinking": "The right ventricle of the heart pumps blood to the lungs. The normal pressure range for the right ventricle is 25/0-5 mmHg. This means that the systolic pressure (when the heart is contracting) is around 25 mmHg, and the diastolic pressure (when the heart is relaxing) is between 0 and 5 mmHg.", "answer_choice": "B. 25/5 mmHg"}
